TextView.android:text: Enter a Valid Email and Password into the Fields. Press Create Account And your unique account will be created.
To Login supply your Valid email and Password, and press the Login Button.

To View movies that are currently in the Cinema, or that are tredning, Press the Now Showing button. This will present you with a List of movies that you can add to your reminder list, by pressing the options icon on each movie and pressing Set Reminder.

To search for a movie, tap the Search button in the menu screen. This will bring up a search bar and button at the top of the screen. Type in any movie title or word and it will return a list of movies for you to add to your reminders, as discussed before.

To View your Reminders, you simply tap on the Reminder Button in the Menu screen. You will then be presented with a list of movies that you have added to your reminder list. To tick a movie off your list, simply tap the options icon, and press watched. This will remove the item from your list.
